casebody.data: Appeal of HERBERT E. CLAYBURGH, IRA KAHN, GUSTAV EPSTEIN. Docket No. 1031. Submitted January 21, 1925; decided February 10, 1925. F. Mandlebawn, Esq., for the taxpayers. Ward Loveless, Esq. (Nelson T. Hartson, Solicitor of Internal Revenue) for the Commissioner. Before GkaupneR, Littleton, and Smith. [NO OPINION]
